title: "Microsoft adds Hindi to its Text Analytics service to strengthen Sentiment Analysis support for businesses"
excerpt: "Text Analytics is part of the Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services. Using this service, organizations can find out what people think of their brand or topic as this enables analyzing Hindi text for clues about positive, neutral, or negative sentiment."
